explanations.Large Language Model: The paper discusses generative AI tools like ChatGPT, which are based on large language models.
explanations.LLM: The paper focuses on the implications of generative AI, which includes large language models (LLMs).
explanations.ChatGPT: The paper explicitly mentions ChatGPT as an example of generative AI tools impacting sustainability reporting.
